attributes.additional_details:
Under David Cameron ideal for NHS-Life sciences partnership. NHS Records would be open up for Private healthcare firms. These reccords are private at the moment only the patient can give the say-so to given his or her information out. But under new rules PM what this information open up and given to healthcare firms with out asking the patient. Therefore this data could end up anywhere and read by anyone.
Therefore NHS Records should only be used by the NHS, if the PM wants information used by Private healthcare firms the patient should have the right to opt-in or op-out of this partnership
